com.marklogic.appdeployer

Interface AppDeployer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAppDeployer, SimpleAppDeployer

    public interface AppDeployer
    Abstraction for deploying and undeploying an application, with an AppConfig instance providing a variety of configuration information for the application. Implementors can do whatever they want, but it is expected that an implementor utilize a sequence of Command objects to define what steps are taken as part of a deploy or undeploy operation. The SimpleAppDeployer implementation in the "impl" subpackage is the common implementation to use which does depend on command instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deploy(AppConfig appConfig)
      Deploy an application based on the configuration found in the given AppConfig instance.
      void undeploy(AppConfig appConfig)
      Undeploy an application - which normally means removing all traces of it from MarkLogic - based on the configuration found in the given AppConfig instance.
